item.title: META
item.description: score:-9 Chances: Meta’s continued development in social media applications and technology is likely to lead to further growth and expansion of their user base and business capabilities. The Supreme Court’s skepticism towards state laws regulating social media content moderation indicates a potential favorable outcome for Meta Platforms, Inc.
